alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton; Pope; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 1:33PM CDT until May 15 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Southern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Northern Johnson County in western Arkansas... Northern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 133 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Moore to near Devils Knob to near Elkins, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Witts Spring... Dillen... Moore... Solo... Smyrna... Devils Knob... Walnut... Bertha... Rosetta... Ben Hur... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Catalpa... Fort Douglas... Yale... Long Pool Campground... Fallsville... Haw Creek Falls Campground... Oark... Wolf Pen Campground... Tilly... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
